title: Five-Star Beachfront Oasis on Mexico's Cozumel Island with Beach Club & Day Spa
description: Experience the vibrant spirit of Mexico at the InterContinental Presidente Cozumel Resort Spa, an IHG Hotel, a luxurious beachfront oasis on the idyllic island of Cozumel. This five-star haven offers a stunning blend of modern luxury and traditional Mexican hospitality. Unwind in the world-class spa, savour authentic Mexican cuisine at El Caribeno Restaurant, sip on refreshing cocktails at Le Cap Beach Club, or dive into the sparkling Caribbean Sea from the resort's stretch of private beach.
location_description: InterContinental Presidente Cozumel Resort Spa, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: KM 6.5 Carretera A Chankanaab Cozumel, Quintana Roo 77600, Mexico
